name: Clock Blocker
description:
In this game you play as Kwasi O the Clock Blocker. A broken timer that blows up when it
reaches zero. 

Kwasi O needs to kill other clocks so they wont hinder his way exploring new rooms and
getting extra time(more health). The clocks can also hurt Kwasi O,  leading to Kwasi O
loosing 1 second of his life for each hit. The question is, will he stay alive long enough to
finish all three floors!

CONTROLS

  • Move character: W A S D
  • Aim: Mouse movement
  • Shoot: Left mouse button or Space

Game is made for a class named AGDD in Reykjavík University, spring 2021.
